application.name: blobdump
application.brief: Program to output a selested blob out to a file
application.description: This program takes a cube with a blob in it, and strings to identify which blob, and reads that blob out to a file specified by the user.

history.change: Changed category from Utility to Import and Export

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.description: This is the cube containing the blob to be output.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: This is the output file the blob will be written as

parameter.name: NAME
parameter.description: This is the name of the blob to be output. It is generally mission-specific, and does not refer to which subclass of blob created it. In the cube's labels, this will be the information to the right of the equals sign after the keyword "Name"

parameter.name: TYPE
parameter.brief: The type of blob to be grabbed
parameter.description: This is the blob type, and generally refers to the subclass of Blob that created the blob, for example, "OriginalLabel", "Polygon", "Table", or "History". This appears in the cube label as the information to the right of the "Object" entry.
